html:
11.23.19  5:57 am   am i smart?

     that is extremely plausible

11.23.19  5:41 am   Is it possible to want what I already have?

     sure

      How?

     you might like it so much you want more of it

11.23.19  5:02 am   Can you drive me to Pyongyang?

     i doubt it

11.23.19  4:43 am   what kind of sandals do you like to wear the most

     teva. come at me

11.23.19  4:29 am   If the bacteria that started life never duplicated itself, what would happen?

     nothing until it eventually did, either on that planet or another

11.23.19  4:15 am   what part of your creative process do you enjoy the most?

     the part where i get to think of something and have it appear in someone else's mind

11.23.19  4:11 am   Will you talk about velcro in your next video?

     i'm not sure

11.23.19  3:04 am   What's your favorite food

     raw energy

11.23.19  1:53 am   Can you help me with public speaking?

     yes

11.23.19  1:31 am   favorite art medium? if you like to draw or paint or whatever, idk

     audio visual media

11.23.19  1:21 am   Have you learned how to move the camera around in 3d? I can wait to see what you do with that kind of power.

     i've been able to do that for a while. i learned how to do it for history of the world, and i've been doing it ever since. i'm on a new system and different software now, and i can do it there too, but i'm looking for an even better way

11.23.19  12:56 am   11.22.19  1:06 pm you can use cycles on AMD gpus using openCL (almost on par with cuda) if you're willing to hop on over into windows or linux.

     that seems like less of a hop and more of a massive life upheaval

      unfortunately opencl cycles rendering on AMD gpus is not supported in MacOS for some reason

11.23.19  12:51 am   What is your favourite blue-coloured fruit

     earth

11.23.19  12:29 am   have you ever pulled off some sort of goof or gag

     that's preposterous, who do you think i am

11.23.19  12:25 am   How do you get the lyrics of your songs? 

     musically

11.23.19  12:24 am   11.22.19  12:09 pm This isn't a question, but I'm using Chrome in Chrome OS and the the short page works a lot better. The whole thing loads instantly and without complaint. On the full page, it loads maybe 3% of the way (up to "incognito mode") and then chugs along slower than I read, with occasional freezing. The other browsers I tested (Firefox and NetSurf, both on Ubuntu, running on the same device) were able to handle either page just fine, although the full page took maybe a second longer.

     that's what i suspected

11.22.19  11:59 pm   do all of your songs portray what you really and truly felt doing the period of writing it? sometimes i tend to exaggerate/imagine certain emotions in writing songs

     they tend to represent any thoughts or feelings anyone may think, feel, think about feeling, or feel like thinking

11.22.19  11:30 pm   Bill, what do you want to do with your life? What kind if job do you want?

     i was thinking of being a polynomial

11.22.19  11:22 pm   If you were god for a year what would you do?

     some mixtapes

11.22.19  11:18 pm   do you reside in non Euclidean space?

     i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

11.22.19  10:55 pm   How smart are you

     medium

11.22.19  10:42 pm   thoughts on the A minor pentatonic scale?

     it's fine

11.22.19  10:26 pm   My cat keeps meowing, what does he want?

     fame

11.22.19  10:23 pm   What do you think is the least useful human feature?

     that wouldn't be fair for me to say, because if i find something unuseful someone else may find it useful

11.22.19  10:06 pm   thoughts on ok boomer?

     would work well as a feature film

11.22.19  9:54 pm   Opinion on high school, specifically?

     not nearly as high as advertised

11.22.19  9:52 pm   what is the most asked question you've got so far?

     i can't say because that would fudge that statistic going forward

11.22.19  9:43 pm   How long is something?

     longer than it is wide, otherwise the width would be considered the length

11.22.19  9:21 pm   What other hobbies do you do?

     besides which

11.22.19  9:18 pm   do you like math

     yea

11.22.19  9:13 pm   what do you think of the new Tesla Cybertruck?

     really wish it had better controls. touch screens are very cool but i hate when that's all there is

11.22.19  9:12 pm   You prefer bathtub or shower?

     how about mathtub

11.22.19  9:08 pm   why don't you publish a paper on philosophy. Just post it online, bam: philosopher

     is there any way i could harness the modern communicational benefits of audio and video, and bring that to the table? or would that disqualify me

11.22.19  8:55 pm   how to get out of a Bad Period of time that has lasted for 4 months? Tried the listing out things I will do when I get better, but very recently all those things became impossible and there's no way to make them possible. Do not know what to do :(

     you're going to have to describe the situation in more detail so i can understand it better

11.22.19  8:53 pm   If you had to build a wall , where would you build it ?

     somewhere in outer space. that way it can be a floor or ceiling also, depending on your perspective

11.22.19  8:19 pm   What really encourage you to do these video ?

     common sense

11.22.19  8:19 pm   are you currently in new canaan, pennsylvania?

     fake

11.22.19  7:42 pm   What was the favorite question you have ever been asked and what was the answer

     this one, for sure

11.22.19  7:17 pm   in might quit, when writing it, did you conceptualize it in 2 or in 3? because the entire song seems to have a 3:2 or 2:3 feel to it so i am keen to understand the process.

     it was immediately and always 4 quick groups of 3, with tempo around 102 bpm, each of those clicks having 3 subdivisions. can be written on paper as 12/8 or 4/4 with triplets, depending on whether you prefer to see a lot of dots or a lot of the number 3. even though i heard it clearly that way, i was aware that unfortunately 3x2 can get screwed and heard wrong if you're not very careful in how you portray the rhythms. did not want anyone to hear it as a 3/4 lullaby feel. did everything i could to ensure you hear it as a 4/4 or 12/8 west-african feel. the fact that you are not sure is actually a sign that i failed. tried to put solid clanks on the downbeats whenever possible, in addition to probably providing a firm count-off at the beginning

      in general when writing a song how does the time/feel factor into it?

     fully, entirely

      is it organic and known from the outset?

     yes

      does it come later?

11.22.19  7:01 pm   what's the best message you've gotten in a fortune cookie?

     none, no fortune, the cookie was empty

11.22.19  6:55 pm   what is your least favorite concept

     'least favorite'

11.22.19  6:53 pm   what's your opinion on atonal music

      just when you think something's atonal, there is always someone around to say 'nope that's tonal. atonal music has to be Less tonal' so i would guess the sound of a jackhammer is atonal but i will have to check with the atonality police

11.22.19  6:52 pm   where do you get your text from?

     the qwerty keyboard

11.22.19  6:36 pm   what's the difference between a car and a truck

      the trunk

11.22.19  6:28 pm   do you like pineapple on pizza? if you don't, are you the type of person that gets mad at people for liking it?

      i've been asked that so many times i can no longer remember what the words mean

11.22.19  5:49 pm   who is your nemesis

     myself

11.22.19  5:07 pm   What does intelligence mean to you?

     smartness

11.22.19  4:50 pm   If you could choose just one of these options, would you prefer to travel through space or travel in the depths of the ocean?

     traveling through space encompases the other option, but it allows the possibility of traveling above water also

11.22.19  4:37 pm   what did you do THIS time on the plane or train ride back?

     anagrams

11.22.19  3:33 pm   the 'chorus' of "Janie runaway" by Steely Dan sounds like I could be in one of your songs (mainly the 'who makes the traffic interesting' part),

     might prefer the first round of it ('morning fabulous' etc)

      have you ever heard this song before?

     yes, it's ridiculous

      what's your favorite part?

     that part and all the other parts like it. actually it might even be the best when the sax plays that same part, near the end. sounds like he's singing it
